   20: 
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(ssh_agent_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include("ssh.hrl").
   27: -include("ssh_agent.hrl").
   28: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   29: 
   30: -export([
   31:          suite/0,
   32:          all/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_suite/1,
   35:          init_per_testcase/2,
   36:          end_per_testcase/2
   37:         ]).
   38: 
   39: -export([
   40:          connect_with_ssh_agent/1,
   41:          request_identities/1,
   42:          sign_request/1
   43:         ]).
   44: 
   45: 
   46: %% Test configuration
   47: 
   48: suite() ->
   49:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 30}}].
   50: 
   51: all() ->
   52:     [request_identities, sign_request, connect_with_ssh_agent].
   53: 
   54: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   55:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
   56:        begin
   57:            ok = ssh:start(),
   58:            chk_unix_domain_socket(Config)
   59:        end
   60:       ).
   61: 
   62: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   63:     ok = ssh:stop().
   64: 
   65: init_per_testcase(connect_with_ssh_agent, Config) ->
   66:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   67:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   68:     AgentUserDir = filename:join(UserDir,"agent"), % just to separate them in the tests
   69:                                                 % so we know that the right dir is used
   70:     file:make_dir(AgentUserDir),
   71:     %% Arrange the host keys in <priv_dir>/system
   72:     ct:log("Host keys setup for: ~p",
   73:            [ssh_test_lib:setup_all_host_keys(Config)]),
   74:     %% Copy the user's files used by the daemon
   75:     {ok,_} = file:copy(filename:join(DataDir,"authorized_keys"), 
   76:                        filename:join(UserDir,"authorized_keys")),
   77:     %% And copy the user's files used by the agent (and not by the user)
   78:     {ok,_} = file:copy(filename:join(DataDir,"id_rsa"),
   79:                        filename:join(AgentUserDir,"id_rsa")),
   80:     Config;
   81: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   82:     Config.
   83: 
   84: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   85:     ok.
   86: 
   87: %% Test cases
   88: 
   89: %%% Request a list of identities
   90: request_identities(_Config) ->
   91:     Request = #ssh_agent_identities_request{},
   92: 
   93:     SocketPath =
   94:       ssh_agent_mock_server:respond(
   95:         <<?UINT32(41),            % message length
   96:           ?BYTE(12),              % message type   (1 byte)
   97:           ?UINT32(2),             % number of keys (4 bytes)
   98:           ?STRING(<<"key-1">>),   % key 1 blob     (4 + 5 bytes)
   99:           ?STRING(<<"lorem">>),   % key 1 comment  (4 + 5 bytes)
  100:           ?STRING(<<"key-2">>),   % key 2 blob     (4 + 5 bytes)
  101:           ?STRING(<<"ipsum">>)    % key 2 comment  (4 + 5 bytes)
  102:         >>
  103:       ),
  104: 
  105:     Opts = [{socket_path, SocketPath}],
  106:     Response = ssh_agent:send(Request, Opts),
  107: 
  108:     #ssh_agent_identities_response{keys = Keys} = Response,
  109: 
  110:     [{ssh_agent_key,<<"key-1">>,<<"lorem">>},
  111:      {ssh_agent_key,<<"key-2">>,<<"ipsum">>}] = Keys,
  112: 
  113:     ok.
  114: 
  115: %%% Request a signature on a binary blob
  116: sign_request(_Config) ->
  117:     PubKeyBlob = <<"key">>,
  118:     SigData = <<"data">>,
  119: 
  120:     SignFlags = ?SSH_AGENT_RSA_SHA2_256 bor ?SSH_AGENT_RSA_SHA2_512,
  121:     SignRequest = #ssh_agent_sign_request{key_blob = PubKeyBlob, data = SigData, flags = SignFlags},
  122: 
  123:     SocketPath =
  124:       ssh_agent_mock_server:respond(
  125:         <<?UINT32(29),                 % message length
  126:           ?BYTE(14),                   % message type   (1 byte)
  127:           ?STRING(
  128:             <<?STRING(<<"ssh-rsa">>),  % signature format (4 + 7 bytes)
  129:               ?STRING(<<"signature">>) % signature blob (4 + 9 bytes)
  130:             >>
  131:           )                            % signature total (4 + 24 bytes)
  132:         >>
  133:       ),
  134: 
  135:     Opts = [{socket_path, SocketPath}],
  136:     SignResponse = ssh_agent:send(SignRequest, Opts),
  137: 
  138:     #ssh_agent_sign_response{signature = #ssh_agent_signature{format = Format, blob = Sig}} = SignResponse,
  139:     Format = <<"ssh-rsa">>,
  140:     Sig = <<"signature">>,
  141: 
  142:     ok.
  143: 
  144: %%% Connect with RSA key from SSH agent
  145: connect_with_ssh_agent(Config) ->
  146:     UserDir = PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  147:     AgentUserDir = filename:join(UserDir,"agent"),
  148:     SystemDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "system"),
  149:     {ok, SocketPath} = ssh_agent_mock_server:start_link('rsa-sha2-256', AgentUserDir),
  150:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  151:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  152:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{user_dir, UserDir},
  153:                                                       {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  154:                                                       {user_interaction, false},
  155:                                                       {auth_methods, "publickey"},
  156:                                                       {key_cb, {ssh_agent, [{socket_path, SocketPath}]}}
  157:                                                      ]),
  158:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  159:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  160:     ssh_agent_mock_server:stop(SocketPath).
  161: 
  162: 
  163: %%%================================================================
  164: chk_unix_domain_socket(Config0) ->
  165:     case ssh_agent_mock_server:check_mktemp(Config0) of
  166:         {skip, Msg} ->
  167:             {skip, Msg};
  168: 
  169:         Config ->
  170:             SocketPath = string:chomp(os:cmd("mktemp -u")),
  171:             case gen_tcp:listen(0, [local,  {ip, {local,SocketPath}}]) of
  172:                 {error,eafnosupport} ->
  173:                     file:delete(SocketPath),
  174:                     {skip, "Unix Domain Sockets are not supported"};
  175:                 {ok, Socket} ->
  176:                     ct:log("Socket = ~p", [Socket]),
  177:                     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
  178:                     file:delete(SocketPath),
  179:                     Config
  180:             end
  181:     end.
